title: Kuwait extends two-day public holiday for 65th National Day, Liberation Day celebrations
summary_full: Kuwait's Cabinet has declared February 25th and 26th, 2026, as public holidays to celebrate National Day and Liberation Day. This announcement grants public sector employees a four-day break, including the weekend, with work resuming on March 1st. The holidays commemorate significant historical events and foster national pride through various public celebrations.
